title: Dirty Little Lies
overview: Whether it's little white lies, or a prolonged and continued betrayal of a loved one, liars are prevalent in society and our own lives. What would you do if you found out all was not as it had once seemed? How far would you go to find out the truth? Featured in this devilish series, Rhonda and Valentino fall for each other and all seems well, but Rhonda has suspicions he is cheating - can she catch him in the act? Dana gets mistaken for a famous actress all the time, but when the line between reality and celebrity impersonation blurs, her lies spin out of control. What does Andre's wife do when she suspects he has a gambling addiction? Witness how lies become the poison in the relationships.
